chunks.zh: 你们都几刷哪吒 2？这票房太猛了。。
chunks.en: How many times have you all seen Nezha 2? The box office is amazing.

chunks.zh: 我先说：还没看过，打算去看一下。各位都几刷。经常刷到有人都三刷，四刷，这票房能不上来吗。
chunks.en: I'll start: I haven't seen it yet, planning to go. How many times have you all seen it? I keep seeing people saying they've seen it three or four times, no wonder the box office is so high.

chunks.zh: 倒也没有为了票房强行刷，就是单纯和朋友看了一遍，请侄子侄女看了一遍，算是二刷过了，整体评价还是可以的，本来有机会免费三刷四刷，不过也懒的看了 orz不过你要是在 V2 上面问，估计有很多人会为了标榜自己口味不同，会表示自己绝对不看这种「国产片」的（手动狗头
chunks.en: I didn't force myself to see it for the sake of the box office. I just watched it once with friends and once with my nephews and nieces, so I've seen it twice. The overall rating is okay. I originally had the opportunity to see it three or four times for free, but I was too lazy to watch it. orz But if you ask on V2, I guess a lot of people will want to show off their different tastes and say they would never watch this kind of 'domestic film' (manual doge)

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 票房低🟰中国人拍的垃圾，票房高🟰政治任务，怎么算都是赢
chunks.en: @fengyueheng Low box office 🟰 garbage made by Chinese people, high box office 🟰 political task, either way it's a win.

chunks.zh: 没看
chunks.en: Haven't seen it.

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 难道看电影都成政治任务了？
chunks.en: @fengyueheng Has watching movies become a political task?

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 大春, 你跟别人不一样
chunks.en: @fengyueheng Dachun, you are different from others.

chunks.zh: 早都不正常了，已经不是一部电影了，变成政治任务了
chunks.en: It's been abnormal for a long time, it's no longer just a movie, it's become a political task.

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 哥们多少有点脑壳不正常。。一部动画片也说任务
chunks.en: @fengyueheng Dude, your brain is a little abnormal. You're calling an animated film a task?

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 现在都流行自带狗粮了，国际开发署都砍了
chunks.en: @fengyueheng Now it's popular to bring your own dog food, even the International Development Agency has been cut.

chunks.zh: 贡献了 12 张票，先是自己小家看了不错，然后就带着一大家去看。有些人心胸狭隘，缺乏欣赏，满口诋毁，我可能就成了 TA 眼中那政治任务的刽子手
chunks.en: Contributed 12 tickets. First my small family watched it and thought it was good, and then I took the whole family to see it. Some people are narrow-minded, lack appreciation, and are full of slander. I may have become the executioner of that political task in their eyes.

chunks.zh: @cominghome 不要看 3D ，不要看 3D ，不要看 3D
chunks.en: @cominghome Don't watch it in 3D, don't watch it in 3D, don't watch it in 3D.

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng #5 什么政治任务？要这么说，敢超过《长津湖》岂不是大逆不道？
chunks.en: @fengyueheng #5 What political task? If that's the case, would daring to surpass 'The Battle at Lake Changjin' be a heinous crime?

chunks.zh: 没看的朋友不要看 3D ，尽量找 2D IMAX
chunks.en: Friends who haven't seen it, don't watch it in 3D, try to find 2D IMAX.

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng 你要是说十一上映的电影有任务也不会被喷，一个过年上映的动漫也有任务？你怕是巧克力吃多了吧
chunks.en: @fengyueheng If you said that movies released during the National Day holiday had a task, you wouldn't be criticized. An animated film released during the Spring Festival also has a task? You must have eaten too much chocolate.

chunks.zh: @hellodigua #2 只能说你太了解润站部分用户了。😂
chunks.en: @hellodigua #2 I can only say that you know some of the users of Run Station too well. 😂

chunks.zh: @sz369 #231 我寻思你一个不想干的普通人评论这个帖子的意义在哪。会分你钱吗🤔
chunks.en: @sz369 #231 I'm wondering what the point is of an ordinary person who doesn't want to do anything commenting on this post. Will they share the money with you? 🤔

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng #5 醒醒，美国国际开发署都大裁员，没有经费了
chunks.en: @fengyueheng #5 Wake up, the US Agency for International Development is having major layoffs, there's no funding.

chunks.zh: v2 还是老样子，我就放心了
chunks.en: V2 is still the same old, I'm relieved.

chunks.zh: @hellodigua 整贴看下来，预测准确 hhh
chunks.en: @hellodigua After reading the whole post, the prediction is accurate hhh.

chunks.zh: 说政治任务纯 SB ，看了次，一次普通，一次 IMAX 。陪的不同人去看的，电影是真好看
chunks.en: Calling it a political task is pure SB. I watched it once, once in regular, and once in IMAX. I went with different people and the movie is really good.

chunks.zh: @fengyueheng #5 你这病得早点治疗啊。。。不然会越来越严重。
chunks.en: @fengyueheng #5 You need to treat your illness earlier... otherwise it will get worse and worse.
